name: wid4_CATI2_module3
label: CATI 2: employment/education (CATI)
description: This questionnaire module contains questions on: classification of occupation; educational and employment status of all household members (employment / education / vocational training / parental leave / pension); history of education and graduation: educational degrees, vocational training, year abroad; occupational status; type of education / training; current status of education / qualification.
